Software Engineer

Passionate about design, javascript, a11y, and content infrastructure

Design is not just how it looks like and feels like. Design how it works.

The Timeline

Have a look on my career timeline

  • Started UX Studying - 2009

    By march 2009 i started to attend courses and buy books to study art concept “Golden ratio, Color theories, ..etc”

  • UI Developer - 2011

    Joined Greatbit, gained more HTML / CSS + JS skills, developed in .Net MVC4 environement.

  • Senior Front-end Developer - Present

    Grew my skills alot in all html5, css3, nodejs, ajax, JQuery, Jekyll, Wordpress and anything interesting

  • Jonior UX/UI Designer - 2010

    Got my first job at Xclusive Travels as a UX/UI Designer and started implementing my work into HTML / CSS.

  • Senior UI Developer - 2012

    By then i developed tens of website and web applications, then joined Sayidaty.net Magazine and started developing mobile apps with phonegap.

About Me

Not a lot but a breif about me

Workholic, I love what I do, a lot. the day I started to learn how the internet works I saw how important the user interface is.

It's not just about colors and good look, It's about how easy and effecient it is, I know about html5, css3, nodeJS, react, sass/less, and I advocate for web standards.

Always trying to keep my self updated with the latest technologies and it's a long run.

The Projects

Some of my personal prjects that i am proud of

Scoop Themes - Free Templates & Components

Free Premium Bootstrap 3 Templates & Themes high crafted like never before in the open source community, All our templates and themes are open source under the MIT license, free to use. Enjoy!

See Details

Biscuit UI - Open Source UI Framework

Biscuit is a UI framework that has it’s own responsive grid system with some helpers classes, and supports RTL direction. Biscuit just started in the open source community and working to add more powerful ui features.

See Details
